00027 struct timeval block_start_time;
00028 
00029 INT dummy_master_start_block()
00030 {
00031   gettimeofday(&block_start_time, 0); 
00032 }
00033 
00034 INT dummy_master_poll_live()
00035 {
00036   struct timeval now;
00037   gettimeofday(&now, 0);
00038   double increment = (now.tv_sec - block_start_time.tv_sec)*1e6 + 
00039                       (now.tv_usec - block_start_time.tv_usec);
00040 
00041   if(increment > 0.1e6) {
00042     return FE_END_BLOCK;
00043   } else {
00044     return SUCCESS;
00045   }
00046 }
00047 
00048 INT dummy_master_poll_dead()
00049 {
00050     return FE_NEED_START;
00051 }
